publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1784 Fiona Hyslop: The Draft Fundable Bodies (The Scottish Agricultural College) (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Fundable Bodies (The Scottish Agricultural College) (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Adam Ingram*, Maureen Watt*

S3M-1784 Fiona Hyslop: The Draft Fundable Bodies (The Scottish Agricultural College) (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Fundable Bodies (The Scottish Agricultural College) (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Adam Ingram, Maureen Watt
